```{r}
# Load necessary libraries
library(kableExtra)

# Create the data frame
data <- data.frame(
  Category = c("Race", "", "First Generation College", "", "Ever Taken DevEd Courses", "", "Average GPA"),
  Subgroup = c("Non-white", "White", "No", "Yes", "No", "Yes", "Average GPA"),
  Augustine_University = c("25%", "75%", "100%", "-", "25%", "75%", "3.41"),
  Julias_University = c("57%", "43%", "86%", "14%", "43%", "57%", "2.61"),
  University_of_Dream = c("75%", "25%", "50%", "50%", "50%", "50%", "3.08")
)

# Add a footnote for empty cells
footnote_text <- "- Empty cell due to insufficient data."

# Create and format the table
kable(data, col.names = c("", "Subgroup", "Augustine University (1)", 
                          "Julias University (2)", "University of Dream (3)"),
      caption = "Student characteristics by school.") %>%
  kable_styling(full_width = FALSE) %>%
  row_spec(0, bold = TRUE) %>%  # Bold headers
  footnote(general = footnote_text, general_title = "Note: ")
```
